title: Determine if parabola
text: If both the $$x$$ and the $$y$$ values or an equation are squared, the equation is not a parabola.
speech: If both the  x  and the  y,  values or an equation are squared, the equation is not a parabola.

title: Specify $$p$$
text: P in this case is $$1$$. Since the form of the parabola is $$y=4{px}^2$$, the equation should specify $$p$$.
speech: P in this case is  1 . Since the form of the parabola is  y, is equal to, 4 p x squared, , the equation should specify  p .

title: Answer
speech: The answer is  y is equal to, 4 times 1 times x squared
